entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -2.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
